RamDiskAsyncLazyPersistService - Class in org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset.impl
This class is a container of multiple thread pools, one for each non-RamDisk volume with a maximum thread count of 1 so that we can schedule async lazy persist operations easily with volume arrival and departure handled.
